backend/main.mo: Defines actor types and data models for lobbies, tournaments, player stats, transactions, bidding, and Omaha game state, including storage mixins and access control imports.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping Spades game rule updates to affected frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file, including hooks, components, styles, and game UI logic.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app container managing authentication, tabs, admin checks, and launching Quick Play games.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettings.ts: Admin panel for viewing platform stats and updating house cut percentage with validation and live feedback.
frontend/src/components/BackendConnectiv: UI indicator showing backend connection status with retry feedback and detailed tooltip messages.
frontend/src/components/DepositWithdrawM: A modal handling deposits and withdrawals, including Flexa-based payment flow, polling, validation, and wallet interactions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GoLiveHelp.tsx: Provides explanatory UI about publishing an app live on the Internet Computer, including steps and link info.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar showing game title, mode toggle, wallet connection options, and deposit/withdraw modals.
frontend/src/components/LivePublishStatu: Displays current site origin and ICP link with metadata, plus copy-to-clipboard controls and build info.
frontend/src/components/LobbyBrowser.tsx: Shows game lobby overview, a notice about upcoming features, and quick-play options for Spades and Omaha.
frontend/src/components/LobbyRoom.tsx: Placeholder lobby room UI indicating multiplayer room features are in development.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal that initializes and saves user profiles for real or offline play, generating guest wallets and handling backend or local storage saves.
frontend/src/components/QuickPlayGame.ts: Component that starts and manages quick-play Spades or Omaha sessions, rendering the appropriate game UI and handling gameplay actions.
frontend/src/components/TournamentSectio: UI section displaying upcoming tournament mode information, with messaging adjusted based on real or fun game mode.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnectMod: Modal providing WalletConnect QR or deep links for mobile wallets, including copy-to-clipboard and wallet app launch actions.
frontend/src/components/WalletInstallMod: Modal prompting users to install a browser wallet like Coinbase Wallet or MetaMask when none is detected.
frontend/src/components/WalletSection.ts: Wallet dashboard showing balance, winnings, and transaction history for online or offline mode, with deposit/withdraw controls.
frontend/src/games/omaha/bots.ts: Simple Omaha bot logic that chooses fold, check, call, or bet actions based on allowed moves and random probability.
frontend/src/games/omaha/engine.ts: Implements Omaha game logic including deck creation, shuffling, game initialization, player actions, and betting flow.
frontend/src/games/omaha/handEvaluator.t: Provides Omaha hand evaluation by testing all 2+3 card combos and ranking five‑card hands.
frontend/src/games/omaha/types.ts: Defines core Omaha types including cards, players, game state, and helper formatting functions.
frontend/src/games/session/quickPlaySess: Creates and manages quick-play sessions for Spades or Omaha, routing actions to the correct game engine and handling bot turns.
frontend/src/games/spades/bots.ts: Contains simple bot logic for Spades bidding and card selection based on legality and heuristics.
frontend/src/games/spades/engine.ts: Implements Spades game logic including deck handling, dealing, bidding, trick play, and hand reset.
frontend/src/games/spades/scoring.ts: Implements Spades scoring rules, target detection, and winner determination based on total scores.
frontend/src/games/spades/types.ts: Defines Spades types such as cards, players, trick structure, game state, and helper card formatting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Tracks actor loading with retry, connection, and error states using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for backend calls using an actor, plus shared frontend game and profile types.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuickPlaySession.t: Manages local quick‑play game sessions, handling player actions and paced bot actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeb3Wallet.ts: Implements Web3 wallet detection, connection, balance fetching, and guest wallet support.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind‑based global styles with theme variables, animations, utilities, and custom UI elements.
frontend/src/lib/web3modal.ts: Contains Base chain metadata and placeholders for future Web3Modal integration.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, React Query, and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/icpLinks.ts: Helpers for resolving the IC canister ID, generating IC gateway links, and copying text to the clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/sleep.ts: Provides a simple promise-based sleep function.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing Spades scoring features, issues, and pending requests.
